title: M249 Practical Modern Statistics
text:
M249 is a second level Maths and Statistics model, with four sections:

medical statistics
time series
multivariate analysis
Bayesian statistics

title: M249 Practical Modern Statistics
text:

Some students have found that the windows app ‚ÄúLearn Bayes‚Äù does not properly display triplots when running in virtualization software (e.g.¬†Parallels on macOS).

title: richard johnson
text:
An ex card-player, I can be found working at Andrew Robson Bridge, and teaching for the Open University.
I‚Äôm a statistician interested in uncertainty - R is the first-class language that I prefer, occasionally a little Python.
I enjoy playing with natural languages too, run trails and study yoga. I üíö learning, so always happy to hear your interests!

title: M348
text:
Quarto
Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished presentation. To learn more about Quarto presentations see https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/.

title: M348
text:
Bullets
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes:

Content authored with markdown
Output from executable code

title: M348
text:
Code
